page.title: 15MY LEISURE TIME-D.FARRY.
page.content: I am a member of Hutton Henry Youth Club.It costs 20p for a session.It is held each Tuesday 7pm till 9pm.The people who run the Club are Mr.Wilson and Mr.Truswell.At the Club we play pool,table tennis,football and we can buy sweets In the summer trips are organised.This year we are going to Lightwater Valley.I am also a member of the Badminton Club.The entrance fee is 30p and it is organised by each Friday evening Mr.Hilton and Mr.Armstong.You do not need your own racquet because you can borrow one from the club.On Thursdays I go to the disco run by the Church Committee and it costs me 20p.Saturday I go swimming with my friends but I have to leave the village and travel to Hartlepool for this. I also like going on cycle rides,playing with my computer and watching television.
